source:
%%pyspark

#Load to Dataframe (CSV)
df_app = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Application.csv', format='csv', header=True).distinct()
df_candidate = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Candidate.csv', format='csv', header=True).distinct()
df_department = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Department.csv', format='csv', header=True).distinct()
df_job = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Job.csv', format='csv', header=True).distinct()
df_joblist = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/JobList.csv', format='csv', header=True).distinct()
df_stage = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/Stage.csv', format='csv', header=True).distinct()

#Load to Dataframe (Parquet)
df_canstghist = spark.read.load('abfss://dlsg2markfilesystem@synapsedlakestgen2mark.dfs.core.windows.net/capstone/GecoAPI/dbo.CandidateHistoryWebHook.parquet', format='parquet', header=True).distinct()

#Change 'undefined' to empty space
df_app = df_app.fillna(value = "")
df_candidate = df_candidate.fillna(value = "")
df_department = df_department.fillna(value = "")
df_job = df_job.fillna(value = "")
df_joblist = df_joblist.fillna(value = "")
df_stage = df_stage.fillna(value = "")
df_canstghist = df_canstghist.fillna(value = "")

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#Applications + Stage

df_appStage = df_app.join(df_stage, [df_stage['Id'] == df_app ['stageId'], df_stage['applicationId'] == df_app ['id']], 'left') \
    .select(df_app['Id'], df_app['candidateId'], df_app['stageId'], col('type').alias('stage'), 'jobId')

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStage + Job

df_appstJob = df_appStage.join(df_joblist, [df_joblist['Id'] == df_appStage['jobId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'], df_appStage['candidateId'], 'stageId', 'stage', df_joblist['departmentId'])

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStageJob + Department

df_appstjobDept = df_appstJob.join(df_department, [df_department['Id'] == df_appstJob['departmentId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'], df_appStage['candidateId'], 'stageId', 'stage', col('name').alias('department'))

from pyspark.sql import functions as f
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

#AppStageJobDepartment + Candidate

df_appCandidate = df_appstjobDept.join(df_candidate, [df_candidate['Id'] == df_appstjobDept['candidateId']], 'left') \
    .select(df_appStage['Id'].alias('applicationId'), 'candidateId'
        , 'stageId', 'stage', col('department').alias('jobDepartment'))

#Remove undefined
df_appCandidate = df_appCandidate.fillna(value = "")

#Add offer columns
df_appCandidate = df_appCandidate.withColumn("softOffer", lit(False))
df_appCandidate = df_appCandidate.withColumn("hardOffer", lit(False))
